name: Welcome Home Master!
description:
In "Welcome Home Master", you play as a Shiba who wants to express his love. You're a dog so you guess putting things on the floor is great.

I hope you will feel the awesomeness of the music I chose! (It feels like the dog is playing it actually) 'We have joy' by Puyo Puyo.

link: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Puyo_Puyo/Lullab...

Also I used that pretty aweome Unity asset for my 3D objects: Complete Home Interior, https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/?gclid=CjwKE...!/content/31049
